title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 402.4 - Merit system
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 402.4 - Merit system

State Regulations
(a) The social services district shall
establish and maintain methods of personnel administration in conformity with
standards for a merit system as prescribed by the Civil Service Law. (b) The social services district shall
develop and implement an affirmative action plan for equal employment
opportunity in all aspects of personnel administration in furtherance of the
purposes of article 15 of the Executive Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
402.4

Amended

New

York State Register December 23, 2015/Volume XXXVII, Issue 51, eff. 12/23/2015

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
